name: Flowsheet Document
summary: Learn about .FSD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The COCO simulation environment consists of several components and utilities that allow you to model chemical processes. One of the components is the CAPE-OPEN Flowsheet Environment (COFE), which is a GUI to chemical flowsheeting and allows you to save and open FSD files. FSD files can also be used as CAPE-OPEN unit operations, which means you can use them inside COFE or other simulators.

description: Flowsheet document created and used by the Cape Open to Cape Open (COCO) simulation environment; contains a chemical flowsheet, which may include streams, unit operations, controllers, and flow constraints; also stores information used to configure the flowsheet, such as stream types, color schemes, flowsheet options, and property packages.
